regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction0 import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data, Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 from urlresolver.plugins.lib import jsunpack # If you have urlresolver # from resolveurl.plugins.lib import jsunpack # If you have resoleUrl url=re.findall('href="(h.*?vip/discoveryhy[^"]+)',page_data)[0] source=requests.get(url,headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0','referer':'http://www.tv-onlinehd.com/vip/discoveryhyh.php'}).content eurl=re.findall('iframe\s*src="(h.*?embed/[^"]+)',source)[0] source=requests.get(eurl,headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0','host':'wstream.to','referer':url,'accept':'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8','connection':'keep-alive'}).content packed=re.findall('(eval.*m3u8.*)',source)[0];gm3u8=jsunpack.unpack(packed).replace('\\','') return re.findall('.+src:\s*"(http.+?m3u8[^"]+)',gm3u8)[0]+'|user-agent=ipad&referer='+eurl
